proposal: Hey Boba Tea enthusiasts, congrats on reaching 40 holders in the ETH network! 🎉 Your unique blend of ERC-20 & ERC-721 is as refreshing as a cup of bubble tea on a hot day. Fancy adding a dash of DEX or a sprinkle of Lottery to your recipe? Our B2B tools are like tapioca pearls, ready to be scooped up by anyone in the community. Let's brew something amazing together! 🍵
